channel.title: Host help?
channel.description: ok so me and my fellow co-owner made a server and he would like me to be the hoster bcuz im on longer ...also so our server can b on 24.7 but he coded the server and idk how to make myself the hoster...i have all the files and source..ect but how can i make myself host?!?!?!?!?!!?HELP

item.title: Host help?
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

Just run your server and let people on it, simple.
